description: This file defines a singleton helper class for managing a SQLite database for notes, including methods for creating, inserting, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, with support for searching notes by title or content.

classes.name: DatabaseHelper
classes.description: A singleton class providing methods for database operations related to notes.

methods.name: database
methods.description: Getter that initializes and returns the database instance asynchronously.

methods.name: _initDatabase
methods.description: Initializes the database by creating the database file and setting up tables.

methods.name: _onCreate
methods.description: Creates the notes table when the database is first created.

methods.name: insertNote
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Retrieves a list of notes, optionally filtered by a search term in title or content.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the database.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note from the database by its ID.
